Class JsonFileWriter

Saves the output data to JSON Files.

Hierarchy

  • JsonFileWriter

Index

Constructors

  • constructor

Properties

  • logger

Methods

  • buildFilename
  • ensureOutDir
  • saveFile
  • setCrawlerMetainfo

Constructors

constructor

  • new JsonFileWriter(outDir?: string, logger?: Logger, fileNameBuilder?: FileNameBuilder): JsonFileWriter

  • Creates are new JsonFileWriter.

    Parameters

    • Default value outDir: string = "output"

      The path to the directory, relative to executed script, defaults to 'output'

    • Default value logger: Logger = new SilentLogger()

      An optional logger, which will log 'Saving file + path' in green color.

    • Optional fileNameBuilder: FileNameBuilder

      A custom callback for building the filename, which will be called during saveFile() - allows to implement dynamic filenames.

    Returns JsonFileWriter

Properties

logger

logger: Logger

An optional logger, which will log 'Saving file + path' in green color.

    Returns void

saveFile

  • saveFile(data: OutputData, context: Context, callback: any): void

  • Saves to the data to a json file.

    Parameters

      output data to save
